TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in the city of GPE , GPE . He was represented before the ORG by Mr R.Y. Martynovskiy , a lawyer practising in GPE . The respondent Government were represented by PERSON , their Agent .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
The applicant is physically disabled and can not move about without the assistance of another person .

On DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in LOC against ORG on account of its failure to provide him with a new vehicle for disabled persons in place of the old one that he had been using since DATE . The applicant also requested the court to order the defendant to provide him with a new vehicle within DATE .

On DATE the court allowed the applicant 's claim in part , ordering the ORG to provide the applicant with a vehicle . At the same time the court refused to fix any time - limit for the defendant to comply with this judgment . This judgment was not appealed against by either party and became final on DATE .
On DATE the enforcement proceedings were opened .
These proceedings were terminated several times . It appears that the judgment of DATE could not be enforced because of the lack of funds in the ORG budget .
On DATE ORG took proceedings in LOC , requesting the suspension of the enforcement of the judgment of DATE and a stay of the enforcement proceedings .
On DATE ORG rejected ORG action .
On DATE the applicant received the vehicle in question and the enforcement proceedings were terminated .

Paragraph CARDINAL stipulates that a disabled person is provided with a vehicle free of charge or at PERCENT of its price for DATE without having the right to sell it , donate it or transfer it to a third person . After the expiry of the said period , the disabled person can use the vehicle until he receives a new one .
